sense.gloss: to put something out of the way, to move (something, someone) aside
to remove, to exclude, to take away
to set aside, to keep apart
to remove (someone) from the group, to shun
to do well despite difficulties, to accomplish despite adversity
to do resolutely, to do boldly

sdata.j: なるほどその↑計画↑↓けいかく↓は↑難↑↓むずか↓しい↑仕事↑↓しごと↓だが、↑原↑↓はら↓さんならやって|のける|だろう。
sdata.e: It's true that the project is a difficult task, but Mr Hara will be able to bring it off.

sdata.j: どうして↑彼↑↓かれ↓らの↑疑↑↓うたが↓いと↑恐怖↑↓きょうふ↓を↑払↑↓はら↓い|のける|ことができようか。
sdata.e: How can we dispel their doubts and fears?

sdata.j: ↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓に↑近↑↓ちか↓づこうとするといつも↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓は↑私↑↓わたし↓を↑押↑↓お↓し|のける|。
sdata.e: Whenever I try to get near her, she pushes me away.
